page.title: 07THE HILL VILLAGE HALL
page.content: The Hill Village Hall is about 100 years old and was originally built as a Methodist chapel. Now the Village Hall is raising money to have some improvements done. The Village Hall has a little kitchen and poor toilets so the improvements are to build a bigger kitchen and some better toilets. The Village Hall has various entertainments for the village such as the Christmas Carol Service. The money raised goes to children's charities. Every month there is a talk about an interesting subject. Out of the 146 households we surveyed 35% were represented at The Hill Gala, 27% at The Hill Produce Show and 23% at the Carol Service. 62% of families in our area do not attend functions at The Hill Village Hall at all.
